All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class StreamedMailParser
extends java.lang.Thread

Parse, reassemble, collect information and push messages to the MailManager.

Version:
0.1a
Author:
Benoit Giannangeli

Method Detail

selectParser

public StreamedMailParser.ParserThread selectParser()
Select a ParserThread in parserPool. If the pool is empty, creates a new thread and return it. Else if one the thread is free, return it. Else if limit not reached, creates a new thread and return it. Else select the thread with the smaller queue and return it.

Returns:
the selected ParserThread

run

public void run()
Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
Overrides:
run in class java.lang.Thread

push

public boolean push(StreamedSmtpMessage message)
Push a message to be parsed. When a message (whether partial or not) is complete, the messages bulk is pushed to the completeQueue. It also control that the message do not exceed the allowed message size specified by lightattachment.xml.

Parameters:
message - the message to push into.
Returns:
false if the message is too large.

pushComplete

private void pushComplete(java.util.ArrayList<StreamedSmtpMessage> complete)
Sort and push a messages bulk to the completeQueue.

Parameters:
complete - the messages bulk.
